[DQC.IFRS.0102.9542] Equity with a value of 62,160,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI and Noncontrolling Interest ( 55,857,000,000 + 1,638,000,000 ) with a value of 57,495,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Equity fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Stockholders Equity Including Noncontrolling Interest : -6 Decimals of Stockholders Equity Excluding NI : -6 Decimals of Noncontrolling Interest : -6
